title: Sample Quiz
description: A sample quiz to test the quiz system

answers.text: An interdisciplinary approach to enable the realization of successful systems
answers.explanation: Systems Engineering is an interdisciplinary approach that focuses on designing and managing complex systems over their life cycles.

answers.text: A programming language for embedded systems
answers.explanation: Systems Engineering is not a programming language but an engineering discipline.
While Systems Engineering includes project management aspects, it is a broader engineering discipline.

questions.text: Which of the following are key aspects of Systems Engineering?

answers.explanation: Requirements Engineering is a fundamental aspect of Systems Engineering.
System Integration is a key process in Systems Engineering.
Verification and Validation are essential to ensure the system meets requirements.
While important for product success, Marketing and Sales are not core Systems Engineering activities.
